name: Roger Oliveira

summary: I am a software developer with experience since 2015 in both established corporations like HP, Dell, and ADP, as well as dynamic startup environments. My expertise covers a wide range of languages and frameworks. I hold a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from FIAP, along with postgraduate studies in Data Science, Software Engineering, and Mobile Development. Currently, I am studying Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and applying it to a project called 'DDD Forum', available on my GitHub. I am driven by a passion for creating software that makes a meaningful impact, simplifying processes, and improving the lives of users and clients through innovative and efficient solutions.
